What's a blone?
 
 I'm blonde. I'm also in law school. No, I'm not "legally blonde", in Australia we are not able to submit video applications. I love Blonde jokes. I especially love how most people have already assumed my intellect by virtue of my hair colour. I enjoy making, and watching, those who underestimate me squirm. :)

Speaking of blondes and law, here is my favourite blonde joke.
 
 A blonde is speeding down the highway, when she gets pulled over by the police. The cop, who also happens to be a blonde, walks up to the driver's window and asks to see her driver's licence.
 
 The driver searches frantically through her bag and eventually pulls out a credit card and shows it to the cop.
 
 "No miss, I asked for your driver's licence," says the cop.
 
 Next the driver produces a video club card, followed by an ATM card, a CD, a note book, and a post card.
 
 The cop is getting a little frustrated, so explains, "Your driver's licence is about the size of a credit card, but it has a picture of you on it."
 
 The driver has one last search in the bottom of her bag and comes out with a small vanity mirror. She takes a quick look into the mirror and hands it to the cop.
 
 The cop also takes a quick into the mirror and hands it back saying, "Oh, I'm sorry for stopping you, I didn't realise you were a cop. Have a nice day."

 This is my favorite blonde joke;
 
 An attractive blonde woman boards a plane headed for New York. Just as she takes a seat in first class an air hostess asks to see her ticket. The air hostess notices the woman has only purchased an economy seat
 "I'm sorry Miss but your sitting in the wrong section, your ticket is in economy class not first class"
 The blonde woman pipes up with "I'm young, I'm blonde and I'm beautiful! I'm sitting here, first class all the way to New York, and, there's not a damn thing you can do about it"
 Not wanting to argue, the air hostess moves on to find the supervisor to handle the situation. Soon there is a supervisor standing in front of the blonde woman once again requesting she move to the economy seat. The blonde replies, "I'm young, I'm blonde and I'm beautiful! I'm sitting here, first class all the way to New York, and, there's not a damn thing you can do about it"
 The supervisor walks off and enters the cockpit, "Sorry, but we seem to have an issue with a passenger in first class, a young blonde woman with an economy ticket is refusing to move out of a first class seat".
 The Captain smiles "Don't worry, i will take care of this"
 The Captain walks into first class and over to the blonde woman, he bends over and whispers in her ear. The blonde woman jumps up quickly exclaiming "Oh gosh I'm so embarrassed, i will move right away"
 As the blonde woman wanders of to take her seat in economy the supervisor confronts the Captain "What did you say to get her to move?"
 The Captain grins, "It was easy, i told her first class wasn't going to New York".
